title: 1960s Epic Movies
description: Sweeping landscapes, cast-of-thousands spectacles, and legendary scores -- test your knowledge of the great epic films of the 1960s!

questions.question: Which 1962 epic starring Peter O'Toole tells the story of a British officer in the Arabian desert during World War I?
Who directed 'Lawrence of Arabia' and 'Doctor Zhivago'?
Which 1960 epic film tells the story of a slave revolt in ancient Rome, directed by Stanley Kubrick?
options: The Fall of the Roman Empire

questions.question: Elizabeth Taylor starred as the Egyptian queen in which notoriously expensive 1963 film?
options: The Fall of the Roman Empire

questions.question: Which 1965 epic musical set in Austria won the Academy Award for Best Picture?
Omar Sharif starred alongside Peter O'Toole in 'Lawrence of Arabia' and also played the title role in which 1965 epic?
options: The Fall of the Roman Empire

questions.question: Which 1960 film starring John Wayne depicted the famous 1836 Texas battle?
'The Longest Day' (1962) depicts which famous World War II military operation?
Which 1962 epic western featured an all-star cast including John Wayne, James Stewart, and Gregory Peck?
options: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance

questions.question: Who composed the iconic sweeping score for 'Lawrence of Arabia'?
Charlton Heston starred as a besieged Chinese general in which 1963 epic?
Which 1966 epic starred Charlton Heston as General Charles 'Chinese' Gordon defending Khartoum?
Which film technique, using an ultra-wide curved screen, was famously used for 'How the West Was Won'?
Robert Bolt wrote the screenplay for both 'Lawrence of Arabia' and which other David Lean epic?
options: The Bridge on the River Kwai
